entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
